testcase.name: testStep3_makeEveryone3yearsYounger_bothVisaApplicationsAreMarkedInvalid
testcase.system-out: Running step 3 Do you want to make everyone 3 years younger? Enter 'yes' or 'no': Making everyone 3 years younger Passport[no:CA-SARAH-1, name:Sarah Murphy] is now 47 Passport[no:CA-SIMON-2, name:Simon Murphy] is now 9 Passport[no:AU-EMILY-3, name:Emily Brown] is now 13 Passport[no:AU-JAMES-4, name:James Brown] is now 14 ==== DROOLS SESSION START ==== Passport[no:CA-SARAH-1, name:Sarah Murphy] is INVALID because it is expired Passport[no:CA-SIMON-2, name:Simon Murphy] is INVALID because it has no space for visa Issue visa for passport number CA-SARAH-1 Issue visa for passport number CA-SIMON-2 Issue visa for passport number AU-EMILY-3 Issue visa for passport number AU-JAMES-4 Set FamilyVisaApplication[#10, CA-SARAH-1,CA-SIMON-2] invalid as it contains invalid passport Set FamilyVisaApplication[#11, AU-EMILY-3,AU-JAMES-4] invalid as everyone is younger than 16 ==== DROOLS SESSION END ==== ==== INVALID FAMILY VISA APPLICATIONS FROM RULE UNIT === Invalid:FamilyVisaApplication[#10, CA-SARAH-1,CA-SIMON-2] Invalid:FamilyVisaApplication[#11, AU-EMILY-3,AU-JAMES-4] == Visas from rule unit == == Group leaders from rule unit ==
